Reviews.Title: Excellent semi-smart phone
Reviews.Author: Fred Gibson Jr
Reviews.Content: I love flip phones.  I seem to break many of the other types of phones.  This phone has some internet functions, but it is not what I would call a smart phone.  I use my phone for phone calls, texts... occasional pictures.  I've had one of these for several years and bought this one for my son when his last one broke.  He also loves it.  I'd buy another and I hope I can keep finding them in the future.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: joanne
Reviews.Content: same phone i had before i really love it.... everything is not for everybody those that dont like thats their opinion

Reviews.Title: finally found one
Reviews.Author: Douglas Durow
Reviews.Content: Had been looking for a quality lotus 600 for some time.  Not disappointed.  Phone came in excellent shape (as advertised), works great, arrived before scheduled time.  I would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Phone's great!
Reviews.Author: timchina
Reviews.Content: Works well and its easy to use. I like its size and its versatility. In my opinion there are no negatives about this phone.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good
Reviews.Author: Ren Leo
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to stay in touch with and old friend. My sister and I had been looking at the LG Lotus (and elite) for a while before finally getting this one. It does what it's supposed to, and as stated by the seller, as a few small blemishes, nothing that makes it unusable.  The only problem I have, is that I camera dosent seem to work. I'm not sure if that was stated before, but oh we'll.The seller also left a kind note with both an E-mail and phone number in case I needed to contact them. : DWould buy from them again!

Reviews.Title: Not the Best
Reviews.Author: AliciaLorraine
Reviews.Content: Two years ago, this phone was the free uprgade from a Nextel model through Sprint, which is why I own it. Up until a month ago, everything worked as it should and I had no complaints. Now, however, it barely holds a charge, frequently fails to send/receive text messages, and often goes straight to voicemail even if I'm in an area where I have full service. I find it very suspicious that this phone suddenly begins to malfunction a few months before it's time for contract renewal--I think that it was designed this way on purpose so that Sprint's customers would have to upgrade immediately instead of at their contract's expiration. Seems like this way they're able to rope more people into new contracts instead of risking them having the chance to shop around with other companies.

Reviews.Title: dont wast your money
Reviews.Author: Andrew J. Rosen
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my wife it took a week to get here and arrived with NO battery we had to wait 2 days for the battery to come from a different shipper when we got her phone is was scratched and damaged plus it keeps shutting off on her and not holding a charge nor works the way i thought worst thing o ever spent my money on and is not worth what he wants!!!

Reviews.Title: Phone arrived, poorly packaged and without a battery. DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: amazong
Reviews.Content: Phone was worthless. For the price, without a battery and rattled, this phone was not worth it. It does not work well thanks to damage during shipping. It is almost not worth returning because of the time I will have to spend.Do not waste your time.
